attributes.action: Support Design Option A for the redevelopment of the Victoria Leisure Centre Nottingham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Option A offers the most facilities of the design options, for the least cost.  It is the best value for money, and it is far more environmentally friendly to adapt an existing building than it is to knock it down and replace it with a new one.

rejection.details: Please contact your council regarding this issue.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
